title: Checkin' It Thrice Edition
description:
Stephen Metcalf, Dana Stevens, and Laura Miller discuss the best TV, books, and movies of 2015.
 
The Slate Culture Gabfest is brought to you by Prudential’s 40/40 Vision, a multimedia microsite exploring what life—and the future—looks like to today’s 40-somethings. Hear what inspires real people, the hopes they have for tomorrow, and much more. See yourself in their stories at slate.com/4040vision/family.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
